original: @134b dug zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: @134b dug zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba /

original: bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the goddess of medicinal nectar, Stream of Wealth.

original: tadya th'a / aom su ru su ru ka /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom su ru su ru ka /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa dang / gzi brjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gcan gzan mche ba'i dug bcom mo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa dang / gzi brjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gcan gzan mche ba'i dug bcom mo //
translated: By the truth and splendor of the Blessed Buddha, the poison of nāgas, the poison of snakes, the poison of concoctions, the poison of exhalation, the poison of roots, and the poison of fangs of beasts of prey are destroyed.

original: dug nges par bcom mo zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dug nges par bcom mo zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say, Poison is definitely destroyed!

original: dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī that pacifies all poisons is complete.
